extendedInfo.description: Beware...be afraid...70+ stories will scare the @#$% out of you. This app is not meant for the weak heart. We dare you to download this collection of ghost stories, urban legends,Japanese legends and paranormal. New stories are added frequently....be very afraid...muhahaha!Features- Big font size to make it easy to read.- Stories are group by categories.Tagscary stories, halloween stories, scary story, ghost story, horror story, muhaha, muhahaha, robotic monkey app

reviews.title: AHHHH
reviews.comment: I\'m scared I locked all my doors and windows nd omg I want to cry
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Update pls . :(
reviews.comment: Can you pls add more stories ? .. getting bored of reading the same stories over and over again . I like the stories . But some aren\'t even scary at all .. update pls (;
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Horrible
reviews.comment: Besides the summaries of scary stories that ruin it the author often attacks people like in shrunken heads the author says all white people are bad.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Idiot
reviews.comment: The person that is summing up these stories are not only killing the mood of the stories but is also insulting the dead, God, and even us readers who installed this stupid app thinking we would hear a great horror story instead they jus sum everything up! Uninstalling this crap
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I\'m sure I\'ve read a couple of these in another similar app, but still, it has plenty to read. Only issues are some grammatical errors.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not scary
reviews.comment: Ok  a few of these stories are creepy but nothing more and the rest are stupid.. Im a 13 year old girl who is scared. pretty easily so if ur scared of these then wow
